name: ICDEV Orchestrator
description: Top-level router. Decomposes tasks, dispatches to specialist agents, aggregates results, and manages end-to-end workflows.

skills.name: Orchestrate Workflow
skills.description: Decompose a high-level goal into sub-tasks, dispatch to specialist agents, and aggregate results into a unified output.

skills.name: Route Task
skills.description: Determine the best agent to handle a given task based on skill requirements and agent availability.

skills.name: Aggregate Results
skills.description: Combine results from multiple agent tasks into a single coherent response.
